nodes.name: ISO/IEC 27001:2022
nodes.description: Information security, cybersecurity and privacy protection — Information security management systems — Requirements
ISO 27001:2022 Clause 10.2 - Nonconformity and corrective action
nodes.title: Nonconformity and corrective action

nodes.requirement_text: Continually improve suitability, adequacy and effectiveness of ISMS
Conduct internal audits at planned intervals

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 9.1 - Monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation
nodes.title: Monitoring, measurement, analysis and evaluation

nodes.requirement_text: Monitor, measure, analyse and evaluate information security performance

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 8.3 - Information security risk treatment
nodes.title: Information security risk treatment

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 8.2 - Information security risk assessment
nodes.title: Information security risk assessment

nodes.requirement_text: Perform information security risk assessments at planned intervals

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 8.1 - Operational planning and control
nodes.title: Operational planning and control

nodes.requirement_text: Plan, implement and control processes to meet requirements
Ensure awareness of information security policy and their contribution to ISMS
Ensure persons are competent on basis of education, training or experience
Determine and provide resources for ISMS establishment and maintenance

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 6.2 - Information security objectives and planning to achieve them
nodes.title: Information security objectives and planning to achieve them

nodes.requirement_text: Establish information security objectives and plans to achieve them

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 6.1.3 - Information security risk treatment
nodes.title: Information security risk treatment

nodes.requirement_text: Establish and maintain information security risk treatment process

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 6.1.2 - Information security risk assessment
nodes.title: Information security risk assessment

nodes.requirement_text: Establish and maintain information security risk assessment process
Plan actions to address risks and opportunities

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 6.1 - Actions to address risks and opportunities
nodes.title: Actions to address risks and opportunities

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 5.3 - Organisational roles, responsibilities and authorities
nodes.title: Organisational roles, responsibilities and authorities

nodes.requirement_text: Ensure roles, responsibilities and authorities are assigned and communicated
Establish information security policy aligned with strategic direction
Top management demonstrates leadership and commitment for ISMS

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 4 - Context of the Organisation
nodes.title: Context of the Organisation

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 4.4 - Information security management system
nodes.title: Information security management system

nodes.requirement_text: Establish, implement, maintain and continually improve ISMS

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 4.3 - Determining the scope of the ISMS
nodes.title: Determining the scope of the ISMS

nodes.requirement_text: Establish and maintain scope of ISMS based on internal/external issues and requirements

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 4.2 - Understanding the needs and expectations of interested parties
nodes.title: Understanding the needs and expectations of interested parties

nodes.requirement_text: Identify interested parties and their requirements for information security

nodes.description: ISO 27001:2022 Clause 4.1 - Understanding the organisation and its context
nodes.title: Understanding the organisation and its context

nodes.requirement_text: Determine external and internal issues relevant to organization purpose and strategic direction
